attributes.action: revoke the part of the 1978 Protection of Children Act that may permit 'members of GCHQ' to make indecent images of children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Protection of Children Act 1978 permits 'members of GCHQ' to make indecent images of children 'for the exercise of any of the functions of GCHQ'.
